title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce website built with React and Node.js, featuring user authentication, payment integration, and inventory management.

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, allowing teams to create, assign, and track tasks efficiently.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: An interactive weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts using data from multiple APIs, with a clean and responsive UI.

title: Blog CMS
description: A custom content management system for blogging, including rich text editing, SEO optimization, and user role management.
